author: gdamour
msg: * Add SessionListener.notifySessionDestruction: clients can now receive
callbacks when a Session is destroyed, e.g. when they expire.
* ClusteredSessionManager uses this callback to properly remove the
destroyed session from its internal storage.
* Sync code with the new WADI API.
This fixes GERONIMO-2764 - Clustered HttpSessions are not properly destroyed

author: jonesde
msg: Changed APACHE2_HEADER file to reflect the new ASF policy of no copyright notices in the headers

author: schor
msg: UIMA-217 and UIMA-218  Reversed test logic in TOP for new test corrected
